products.name: EASY-OFF Oven Cleaner Heavy Duty Deep Clean Aerosol

extendedInfo.detail: Cook with passion. Clean with Easy Off. Cleans tough baked-on spills quickly. Cleans in 5 minutes. Easy-off heavy duty oven cleaner specifically formulated to penetrate tough baked on grease in as little as 5 minutes. Ideal for cleaning ovens/oven doors, Broilers/broiler pans, and stainless steel surfaces. Questions? 1-800-228-4722. For ingredient information, www.EasyOff.us.  Please recycle when empty.
extendedInfo.directions: Use Instruction: Wear long gloves. Warm Oven Cleaning: 1. Preheat oven to 200 degrees F. Once preheated, turn off before applying Easy-Off oven cleaner. 2. Wear long rubber gloves while using. 3. Liberally spread newspaper under oven door and surrounding area to protect floor. for ease of application remove oven racks and clean separately. 4. Hold can upright, pointed away from face. Spray surfaces from a distance of 9-12 inches. Make sure pointing arrow is aligned with black dot. Spray top of oven first, then spray sides and bottom. 5. After application, close oven door. 6. Allow foam to work 5-10 minutes then wipe clean with wet cloth or sponge, rinse frequently. For heavily soiled areas, allow to work longer. 7. After use, rinse spray button thoroughly and drain excess water. Cold Oven Cleaning: 1. Spray in cold oven using warm oven cleaning steps 2-5 above. 2. Close door and allow to stand at least 20 minutes. For heavier soils, allow to stand overnight for 8 hours or longer. 3. Wipe clean with wet cloth or sponge, rinse frequently. Daily Spot Cleaning: Sprain in cold oven. Hold can upright, pointed away from face. Liberally spray spots from a distance of 9-12 inches by pointing arrow on spray button to dot. 2. Allow to stand for 30 sec - 1 min. 3. Wipe clean with a wet sponge, cloth or paper towels. Directions: Shake can well and frequently during use, be sure to point arrow towards directional dot and away from face. Wear rubber gloves. Do not get on skin, clothing or in eyes. Directions: Shake can well and frequently during use, be sure to point arrow towards directional dot and away from face. Wear rubber gloves. Do not get on skin, clothing or in eyes.
extendedInfo.warnings: Danger: Corrosive causes burns to skin and eyes on contact. Harmful if swallowed. Contents under pressure. Read precautions of back.Danger: Corrosive contains sodium hydroxide (lye). Will burn eyes and skin. Harmful if swallowed. Avoid contact with eyes, skin, mucous membranes and clothing. Do not ingest. Use with adequate ventilation. Avoid breathing spray mist. Wear long rubber gloves when using.First Aid: Eyes: Immediately flush eyes with water. Remove any contact lenses and continue to flush eyes for at least 15 minutes. If irritation persist seek medical attention immediately. Skin Contact: Rinse immediately and remove contaminated clothing, Wash thoroughly with soap and water and continue flushing for at least 10 minutes. If discomfort persists, seek medical attention immediately. If Swallowed: Do not induce vomiting. Rinse mouth thoroughly and seek medical attention immediately.Keep out of reach of children. Read warnings, precautions and entire label before use, Note: Follow directions on safety cap to remove it. Do not use knife or other tool to pry cap, doing so may puncture container. Note: place both thumbs directly below the word "here" located on top of cap. Push cap upwards with both thumbs. Align nozzle to dot on can to spray. Precautions: Recommended for use only on porcelain enamel, iron, stainless steel, ceramic and glass surfaces. Avoid excessive use on glass. Do not use on exterior oven surfaces, aluminum, chrome, baked enamel. Do not use on self-cleaning or continues cleaning ovens. Avoid spraying over pilot light. Keep of all electrical connections such as heating element, thermostat, bulb receptacles, light switch. Do not puncture or incinerate container, expose to heat or store at temperatures above 120 degrees F. Never leave can on stove or near source of heat. Avoid freezing.
